response.explain: Since there is no previous action code or execution error, we are starting from scratch. The task is to thaw a date. The date is currently inside the fridge and is freezable. We need to take the date out of the fridge to thaw it.
response.subtask:
(1) Move the robot to the fridge.
(2) Open the fridge.
(3) Grasp the date.
(4) Move the date out of the fridge.
response.code:
